summary: This document is a certificate of true copy from the Department of Transportation, confirming the authenticity of records related to an aircraft file. It includes signatures from Michelle Endsley and Kevin W. F. as legal custodians of the records, dated August 23, 2021, in Oklahoma City.

persons.name: Michelle Endsley
persons.context: Michelle Endsley certifies the authenticity of the aircraft records and is identified as the legal custodian of these records.

persons.name: Kevin W. F.
persons.context: Kevin W. F. is mentioned as the acting manager who affixed the seal of the Department of Transportation to the certificate.

keyFacts: The document certifies the authenticity of aircraft records as of August 23, 2021.
Michelle Endsley is the legal custodian of the aircraft records.
The certificate is signed and dated in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma.
Kevin W. F. is the acting manager who affixed the seal to the certificate.
